full_text:
How well can we predict efficiency in any future in-season game based on what we know as of Game X?

Excluding Off Pass EPA/p, predicting a team's efficiency in their next game is often just as hard as predicting a game that is more than a month away.

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/tErugdBAoX
